description:
Slone is a straight ex-Army guy. He finished his tour of duty six months ago and is slowly easing back into civilian life. He only works part time, so he spends a lot of time in the gym.

At 6'3" he's a tall guy and with his military presence he was a little intimidating at first. But as I got to know him I saw that he's actually kind of a big teddy bear.

He's got some interesting tattoos that he got while in the service. When he was first showing me his (hot fucking) body, he was really excited about telling me the story behind each one. Needless to say, each story involved a girl or alcohol or both!
title: Slone
